Name: Attendance application
Text: A full stack cloud-based application that allows students to log in with QR codes. Has multiple parts, including a mobile layer, a web layer, and a database layer. This application was designed for a software development course.
Title: Attendance Application

Name: Mugan Trial
Text: Mugan Trial is a game about surviving procedurally generated dungeons to try and fight your way to the surface. This game was made for a second-year game development course.
Title: Mugan Trial

Name: Judge Application
Text: This is a final project that is being made to automatically test student's code against test cases for labs to mark them. This project is a full-stack application that uses sandboxing ideas to run code in a safe environment.
Title: Judge Application
